mapper.select: SELECT a.accom_no accomNo, a.host_no hostNo, a.accom_category_no accomCategoryNo, ac.accom_category_name accomCategoryName, a.accom_name accomName, a.create_date createDate, a.update_date updateDate, c.commission_name commissionName, rc.room_count roomCount FROM accom a LEFT JOIN accom_category_inven aci ON aci.accom_category_inven_no = a.accom_category_no LEFT JOIN accom_category ac ON ac.accom_category_no = aci.accom_category_no LEFT JOIN commission c ON c.commission_no = a.commission_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT accom_no, room_no, COUNT(accom_no) room_count FROM room GROUP BY accom_no ) rc ON rc.accom_no = a.accom_no WHERE a.host_no = #{hostNo} ORDER BY a.create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM accom a LEFT JOIN commission c ON c.commission_no = a.commission_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT accom_no, room_no, COUNT(accom_no) room_count FROM room GROUP BY accom_no ) rc ON rc.accom_no = a.accom_no WHERE a.host_no = #{hostNo}

SELECT a.accom_no, ad.admin_name, c.commission_name, a.accom_description, a.accom_description_long, a.accom_name, a.accom_img, a.create_date, a.update_date, rc.room_count, adr.sido, adr.sigungu, adr.road_name, adr.main_building_code, adr.sub_building_code FROM accom a LEFT JOIN accom_address aadr ON aadr.accom_no = a.accom_no LEFT JOIN address adr ON adr.address_no = aadr.accom_no LEFT JOIN admin ad ON ad.admin_no = a.admin_no LEFT JOIN commission c ON c.commission_no = a.commission_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT accom_no, room_no, COUNT(accom_no) room_count FROM room GROUP BY accom_no ) rc ON rc.accom_no = a.accom_no WHERE a.accom_no = #{accomNo}
